tool.name: OGS: ExtractMaterials
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'ExtractMaterials'.
tool.command: for i in $input; do if [ "$i" != "None" ] && [ ! -e "$(basename $i)" ]; then ln -s "$i" "$(basename $i)"; fi; done; ExtractMaterials #if str($material_id).strip() != 'None' and str($material_id).strip() != '': --material-id '$material_id' #end if --input '$input.element_identifier' --output output_1.vtu

param.name: material_id
param.label: material id
param.help: The MaterialID for which elements should be extracted into a new mesh.

tool.help: This tool runs the **ExtractMaterials** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
